content: mickey inspired baby blanket thank you for your interest in my pattern this pattern has not been tested so if you find typographical or numerical errors please inform me so i can correct it i can be contacted via facebook or instagram happy hooking finished size 30 across materials worsted weight #4 yarn in black red yellow o about 600 yards total 5 5mm hook needle scissors gauge not necessary but your finished size may vary stitches us terms skip -skip increase -increase space -space 2-half_double_crochet cluster slip_stitch -slip_stitch o *yarn over insert hook st -stitch into stitch pull up loop* chain -chain twice yarn over pull through all loops on hook single_crochet -single_crochet double_crochet -double_crochet pattern notes this pattern is constructed in 2 parts base blanket and ears this pattern is worked in joining rounds # double_crochet means one double_crochet in each stitch for # stitches designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items base blanket with black round 1 in magic_ring chain 1 12 double_crochet slip_stitch to join 12 round 2 chain 1 *double_crochet-increase* 12 times slip_stitch to join 24 round 3 chain 1
